name: Yet Another Dungeon Game
description:
My first game. It's garbage, but it's my garbage.

Controls:

  • WASD &/or arrow keys for movement.
  • Shift &/or Ctrl for activating your dodge roll.
  • Left Click for attacking if you have a weapon. It will also break you out of your dodge.
  • Right click for throwing your weapon, if you have one.

Credits:

  • A couple sprites were made by my pal Electrick
  • Character and item sprites from LunarSignals: https://opengameart.org/content/overhead-action-rpg-hero-2, https://opengameart.org/content/overhead-action-rpg-characters, https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-items-0
  • Tilemap by Buch: https://opengameart.org/content/a-blocky-dungeon
  • DawnLike for some UI elements: https://opengameart.org/content/dawnlike-16x16-universal-rogue-like-tileset-v181
  • The Crypt by Michael Klier: https://opengameart.org/content/the-crypt
